Create backup¶

You can create a backup of all the content on your Scratchpad.

Creating the backup¶

  1. From the Admin menu go to Configuration > Backup Scratchpad

  2. Select Generate new backup

NOTE: Creating the backups is a resource intensive task, and are processed in the background by Cron. The backup will not be immediately available, so please check back later.
